title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.2 - Effective date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.2 - Effective date

State Regulations

On and after the effective date of this Part, every
enforcement agency and every police officer issuing tickets for traffic
violations, except parking, standing or stopping, shall use a uniform traffic
ticket prescribed by this Part. Any uniform traffic ticket which conformed to
the regulations in effect immediately prior to September 1, 1971 may continue
to be used as provided in section
91.14
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
91.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
